name: Doki Doki Dollmaker
storyline: Nothing lasts forever – at least, that’s what young Lyle has come to believe. Forced to move away from home with his older brother, Lyle finds himself in a new town, far away from a painful past and heading toward a lonely future. When he finds comfort in making dolls using a mysterious sewing kit, he soon discovers that his life will be anything but lonely! Be immersed in this heartfelt tale of love and discover what it means to find yourself, no matter who, or what, is willing to lend a hand!
summary: Doki Doki Dollmaker is an indie boys love visual novel. Make decisions on behalf of Lyle to steer the story in different directions and experience multiple endings.
